MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description: WbSrch is an indepdendent search engine with a suite of tools including maps, domain stats, music search, and a web browser. It was started in 2013 in Portland, Oregon, USA.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_250: A multiplatform tabbed web browser based on Qt and WebKit.
Site.Site_Description_450: A tabbed web browser for Windows, Linux, and OSX based on Qt and WebKit.
Site.Site_Keywords: browser, web browser, web, internet, internet browser, desktop browser, desktop web browser

English.Keywords: browser, web browser, tabbed browser, internet, internet browser, chrome, chromium, blink
English.Char_Desc_80: WbBrowse is a tabbed web browser available on Windows, Linux, and OSX.
English.Char_Desc_250: WbBrowse is a full-featured tabbed web browser available on Windows, Linux, and OSX. It is based on the Blink engine and includes the features of a modern web browser.
English.Char_Desc_450: WbBrowse is a full-featured tabbed web browser available on Windows, Linux, and OSX. It is based on Blink and was built using the Qt framework. It uses the same rendering engine as Chrome and web pages will render in a similar fashion. It features print support, file downloads, private browsing, bookmark management, and web history. WbBrowse was built by the WbSrch search engine development team.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
WbBrowse is a full-featured tabbed web browser available on Windows, Linux, and OSX. It is based on Blink and was built using the Qt framework. It uses the same rendering engine as Chrome and web pages will render in a similar fashion.
It features print support, file downloads, private browsing, bookmark management, web history, and source code view. It also supports modern HTML5 site elements such video and audio. It has both install and uninstall support and has no spyware, adware, or "add-on spam" in its installer.
WbBrowse was built by the WbSrch search engine development team. WbSrch is a search engine that was created in 2013 and launched in 2014 and is currently online at https://wbsrch.com.
